fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau CASE on [Market Title] to a DAX SWITCH(TRUE()) expression using row-level columns 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Title] and 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Name].
